Ekugcineni, ukukhumbula ukukhetha okubambisene kwenza ukudla kwa-Arabhu kube yintokozo engapheli, lapho wonke umthamo uphathwa ngokuzimisela nokuhlonipha izinkambiso zomphakathi. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi wonke umuntu, kusukela kumapheki abangochwepheshe kuya kubathandi bokudla abakhuthazayo, abambe iqhaza ekugcineni izimpande namasiko, ngenkathi bephinde bavule izindlela ezintsha zokuphila nokudla.

**Ukulingana Kwemifanekiso: Ukukhanya Okungakhiwa Kwezikhali Zokukholwa Kucinema Yama-Arabhu**

Njengomlobi wezifilimu ezihlekisayo, ngithathe umbono wokuthi ukukholwa okungakhiwa kuyalungisa kabusha umkhakha wezifilimu, kudala umfanekiso omnene kodwa okugcwele ngemoya wecinema. Lokhu kukholwa, obekungakaze kubonwe phambilini, sekube yisihluthulelo sokuguqula indlela izifilimu ezibukwa ngayo emphakathini wase-Arabhu.

Ababonakude abakhaphi nabaphathi baye bahlelele ngokucophelela ukuthi zonke izikripthi, izindawo, nababonakude bayahambisana ngokugcwele nemiyalo yokukholwa. Lezi ziqondiso ziqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izifilimu ziyabhiyozela ukukholwa okuhlanganyelayo, zisiza ukuthi umphakathi ubone ngobumnene indlela yokuphila, umoya wokuzwana, nokuhlalisana ngokuthula.

Isibonelo somsebenzi othiwa “Ukulingana Kwemifanekiso” sibonisa ukuthi izinzuzo zokubheka kwezifilimu yomphakathi zibalulekile. Abalandeli, ababukeli kanye nabaphikisi baye baqaphela ukuthi zonke izifilimu zihlanganisa izimfundiso ezikholwayo, okuvumela ukuthi zibukwe futhi ziqondwe ngezindlela ezihlelekile futhi ezilandelanayo.

Kubonakala ukuthi lezi zinqumo zezikhali zokukholwa zidalile umkhakha omusha wecinema, lapho izifilimu zingathokoziswa kuzo zonke izigaba zomphakathi. Lokhu kuguqulwa kuye kwenza ukuthi umphakathi usebenzisane ngokubambisana, uqonde futhi uhloniphe izinkolelo zomunye nomunye.

Ukukhanya okungakhiwa kwezikhali zokukholwa kucacisa ukuthi umkhangiso wemibono yokukholwa ungadala izinguquko ezinkulu, ngokubukeka nokuphila kwezifilimu kanye nokuziphatha komphakathi. Kwakha indawo yokukhuluma, ukufunda, nokukhuluma ngokukhululeka ngezindaba zokukholwa, futhi kugcizelela ukubaluleka kokuba nesibopho somphakathi ngokweqile.

Njengomlobi wezifilimu ezihlekisayo, ngiyaziqhenya ngokubona ukuthi ukukholwa okungakhiwa sekuguqule umkhakha wezifilimu, kudala umfanekiso omnene kodwa okugcwele ngemoya wecinema yase-Arabhu. Kubonisa ukuthi ukukholwa nokuzwana kungadalela izifilimu ukubaluleka okukhulu emphakathini, futhi kube yisibonelo esihle sokuthi uma sizibophezela ekuzwaneni, singakha umhlaba ongcono kithi sonke.

**Ukuxazulula Umhlabathi Ophilayo Wezinkolo Zezwe le-Arabhu**

**Isingeniso Esijabulisayo**

Njengoba ungaqapheli, izwe le-Arabhu lihlale liyindawo yokuthakazelisa, enomlingo, futhi egcwele izimfihlakalo. Futhi uma usukhathele izinkanyezi ezifanayo ezindaweni ezivame ukubukwa, lesi siqondiso esihlekisayo sizokuthatha ohambweni olungaqondakali, lapho uzobona khona izindawo ezinhle futhi uzwe izinkolo ezihlukahlukene ngendlela ongakaze uyibone ngaphambili. Njengomvakasheli ohlekisayo, sinethemba lokuthi uzosijoyina ekubukeni umhlaba ngezindlela ezingajwayelekile, futhi uzwe "ukuzizwa kuyo yonke indlela" ngendlela ekhethekile.

**Ukuzimisela Komhlaba Wezinkolo**

Qala uhambo lwakho e-Arabhu futhi uzobona "ukuzimisela" okungapheli kwezindawo ezihlukahlukene ezingcwele. Lapho ufika emadolobheni amakhulu, uzohlangana nezikhathi "ezingcolile" lapho izinkolo eziningi zithola izindlela zokuhlazimulisa abangaphikisani nabo. Hamba ngezinyawo ezisontekile eziholela ezindaweni ezincane, lapho izivakashi zibona khona umuzwa wokubambisana emihlanganweni "eyimfihlo" yezinkolo ezincane.

**Ukuxhumana Nezinhulumeni Zasekhaya**

Kufanele uzwe izikhalazo zezinhulumeni zasekhaya ezithi "zizimele" ekuqeqesheni izivakashi ngezindlela zomdabu. Lezi zindlela azipheleli nje ekuboneni izakhiwo ezinhle, kodwa futhi zihlanganisa nokuzimisela okukhulu kokuxazulula izinkinga eziphakeme. Izinhulumeni zisebenza kanzima ekuzameni ukukhulula izivakashi emicabangweni eyimfihlo kanye nokucindezela okukhona emoyeni.

**Ukubambelela Kwezinhlelo Zokukhonza**

Njengoba uya phambili, uzothola ukuthi izinhlelo zokukhonza zikhona ngisho nasezindaweni ezincane kakhulu. Kulezi zindawo, izivakashi zizobona "babambisene" emihlanganweni yokukhonza, lapho abantu benza izenzo ezicashile nezimfihlo. Lawa magama okukhonza anjengekhethelo lokubona umhlaba ngezindlela ezingajwayelekile.

**Isiphetho**

Ngakho-ke, uma ufuna ukuhamba ohambweni olungajwayelekile, uzothola izinqola ezihlekisayo ezikuthatha ohambweni olungaqondakali, lapho uzobona khona yonke into ethokozisayo neyingqayizivele. Ngaphandle kokukhathazeka, izivakashi zizosizakala "ekuzimiselweni" kokubona izindawo ezingcwele ezihlukahlukene kanye "nokubambisana" emihlanganweni eyimfihlo. Ukuze uqedele uhambo lwakho, qiniseka ukuthi ulalela izikhalazo zezinhulumeni zasekhaya futhi ufunde izindlela zomdabu ezikhulula. Uma usulungile, sizokuthatha ekuxazululeni umhlaba ophilayo wezinkolo zezwe le-Arabhu ngendlela engasoze yaphindwa.
